title: Email Helper
hook: Lightening the load for support staff at the San Francisco Recreation & Parks Department.
description: A bite-sized browser extension for providing non-obtrusive customer service - because little fixes can have a big impact.

title: AR for Accessibility
hook: Smoothing the in-store experience of ADHD shoppers at Giant Eagle.
description: An in-store AR experience at Giant Eagle for limiting visual stimuli & lessening the cognitive overload experienced by shoppers with Attention Deficit Hyperactive Disorder (ADHD).
